name: Under the Light (eviluser7)
description:
Press the fullscreen button from the UI if you wish to play in fullscreen. (recommended)

--------------------

You're afraid of the dark. Find the light and eat to survive.

Gameplay

Use the arrow keys to move.

Get to the light squares before the timer runs out.

Collect apples to avoid dying of hunger.

And do not leave the light.
 
Source
https://github.com/eviluser7/some-raylib/tree/main/under-the-light
